Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the New York police department to report on instances in which an individual denied an officer consent to a search
Items.MatterName: Requiring the New York police department to report on instances in which an individual denied an officer consent to a search.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to granting access to the police department’s body-worn camera footage to the office of the inspector general and the department of records and information services
Items.MatterName: Granting access to the police department’s body-worn camera footage to the office of the inspector general and the department of records and information services.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the police department to report on police-civilian investigative encounters
Items.MatterName: Requiring the police dept to report on police-civilian investigative encounters.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the New York city police department to provide the civilian complaint review board with direct access to officer body-warn camera footage and to establish related procedures
Items.MatterName: Requiring the New York city police department to provide the civilian complaint review board with direct access to officer body-warn camera footage and to establish related procedures.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the evaluation of civil actions alleging improper conduct by the police department
Items.MatterName: Evaluation of civil actions alleging improper conduct by the police department.
